TopicTitle: Push the 3-man Command Pod (Mk1-2) closer to low-tech.

Articles.Content: I really really like doing Apollo-style Mun missions, but the Mk1-2 capsule is waaay up in the tech tree. I'd love to see it moved to the same tier as the Skipper and Poodle. The Skipper kinda fits the purpose of the J-2 Engine and the Poodle (Which I call Rockomax Service Engine because I'm using Ven's Stock Revamp which should become stock anyway) fits the purpose of a Service Module Engine, so getting a 3 man pod for this diameter kinda makes sense. At least, it makes more sense than getting it after the Hitchhiker Storage Container. (Seriously, what are you going to use the HSC for if you don't have a good pod yet?)
Yes maybe. Alternatively add a 2-person pod somewhere in between.
